text: No Man's Land (, Ничија земља) is a 2001 Bosnian French Belgian Italian Slovenian British war comedy drama movie directed by Danis Tanović and starring Branko Đurić, Rene Bitorajac, Filip Šovagović, Georges Siatidis, Alain Eloy, Bogdan Diklić, Mustafa Nadarević. It won an Academy Award in 2002. ==Other websites== * * Category:2001 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Slovenian movies Category:British war movies Category:British comedy movies Category:2000s British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Danis Tanović
title: No Man's Land (2001 movie)
